author: CBC News
title: What you need to know about COVID-19 in B.C. on April 18, 2020
description: After another week without significant leaps in the number of COVID-19 cases, hospitalizations or deaths, British Columbians have been given a glimmer of hope about the future.
content:
THE LATEST:
  • The daily update from health officials is expected at noon PT.
  • As of Friday afternoon, B.C. has confirmed 1,618 cases of COVID-19.
  • 78 people have died of the disease.
  • 966 patients have recovered.
